summary: This is a memorandum documenting a voluntary interview conducted by the DOJ Office of the Inspector General (OIG) with Correctional Officer Tova Noel regarding the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York on August 10, 2019. The interview was part of an official OIG investigation into the circumstances surrounding Epstein's death.

keyFacts: The document is part of an official DOJ OIG investigation (Case Number: 2019-010614) into the death of Jeffrey Epstein.
Correctional Officer Tova Noel was assigned to the Special Housing Unit at MCC New York on August 10, 2019, the day Epstein was found dead.
The interview with Noel was voluntary, recorded, and conducted with her legal counsel and union representative present.
The report includes numerous attachments such as training records, assignment rosters, round sheets, and pictures of Epstein's cell from the relevant period.
The document explicitly states it contains neither recommendations nor conclusions, indicating it is a factual record of the interview and collected evidence.
